attributes.additional_details: Goverment to produce a chart of  UK produced foods ( vegetables, fruits and meats) detailing when they are in season and cheapest to buy. These charts to be displayed by law in all large supermarkets. This will help assist people who don't already know what foods are best, freshest and cheapest to buy in each month, help those with more limited budgets, encourage healthier eating choices, encourage supermarkets to stock UK produce, encourage UK farmers to produce more seasonal foods, reduce imports, reduce food transport costs and will cost the tax payers very little to implement or trial.
